claimsManagementDescription: Manage and track insurance claims across all policies
createNewClaimDescription: Submit a new insurance claim for a policy
noClaimsDescription: There are no claims registered yet. Create a new claim to get started.
additionalNotesDescription: Any additional information or notes about the claim
claimStatusDescription: Current status and history of this claim
searchForPolicyDescription: Search and select the policy for which you want to file a claim
searchPolicyDescription: Search for the policy you want to associate with this claim
searchByPolicyOrPolicyholder: Search by policy number or policyholder name
claimHistoryComingSoon: Claim history functionality is coming soon
errorCreatingClaimDescription: There was an error creating the claim. Please try again.
claimNotFoundOrError: The claim was not found or there was an error loading it
noStatusHistoryAvailable: No status history is available for this claim
unusualStatusTransitionWarning: This status transition is unusual and may not follow standard workflow
updateClaimStatusDescription: Update the status of this claim and add notes for tracking
claimStatusInProcessingDescription: This claim is currently being processed by the insurance company
claimStatusReportedDescription: This claim has been reported to the insurance company
claimStatusAcceptedDescription: This claim has been accepted and approved for payment
claimStatusRejectedDescription: This claim has been rejected by the insurance company
claimStatusAppealedDescription: This claim is under appeal after being rejected
claimStatusPartiallyAcceptedDescription: This claim has been partially accepted, with some aspects approved and others rejected
claimStatusPaidDescription: This claim has been fully paid and is now complete
claimStatusWithdrawnDescription: This claim has been withdrawn by the claimant
